author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The E1M Edge-1 AI Module is a compact, solderable edge AI module unveiled by Alp Lab. It uses a unified PCB footprint with standardized pin definitions, aiming to reduce vendor lock-in and simplify transitions between MCU and MPU platforms. According to the announcement, the E1M is designed around a common hardware and software foundation for […]
title: Alp Lab Unveils E1M Platform with Multi-vendor Embedded Roadmap

author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The ICORE-3576Q38 is a compact 38 mm × 38 mm system-on-module developed by T-Firefly and built around the Rockchip RK3576 application processor. The module targets embedded and industrial designs that require multi-core processing, local AI acceleration, and broad multimedia and I/O support within a small footprint. The ICORE-3576Q38 family is available in three variants. The […]
title: ICORE-3576Q38 SoM packs RK3576 AI processor into a 38 mm module
